body.raw:
{  
   "sqlRequest":[  
      {  
         "requestId":"CheckStatutOrcProcessus",
         "requestContent":"select ID_STATUT_PROCESSUS as ID_STATUT_PROCESSUS from orc_processus where code_technique_processus='PRO_CAL_03' and date_lancement_processus >=(sysdate-1/24/4) order by date_lancement_processus desc fetch first 1 rows only"
      },
      {  
         "requestId":"CheckDmdCalcul",
         "requestContent":"select count(*) as COUNT from dmd_calcul where source_processid in (select ID_CORRELATION from orc_processus where code_technique_processus='PRO_CAL_03' and date_lancement_processus >(sysdate-1/24/4) order by date_lancement_processus desc fetch first 1 rows only)"
      },
      {   "requestId":"CheckPubPointAZOMOY",	"requestContent":"select count(*) as COUNT from PUB_POINT inner join grandeur on pub_point.uidgrandeur = grandeur.uidgrandeur  where  horodate between TO_DATE('2017-06-06 06:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE('2017-06-07 05:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and date_modif >= (sysdate-1/24/30) and idgrandeur like 'PCE_SGPCETVPEC_AZOMOY%'"
      },
{   "requestId":"CheckPubPointC6PMOY",	"requestContent":"select * from PUB_POINT  inner join grandeur on pub_point.uidgrandeur = grandeur.uidgrandeur  where horodate between TO_DATE('2017-06-06 06:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE('2017-06-07 05:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and date_modif >= (sysdate-1/24/30) and idgrandeur like '%SGPCETVPEC%' and idgrandeur like'PCE_SGPCETVPEC_C6PMOY%'"},
